Minute Entry for proceedings held before US Magistrate Judge Silvia Carreno-Coll: Arraignment/Detention as to Jose Roman-Cotto (1) Count 1,2-3 held on 2/27/2014. AUSA Luke Cass and defense counsel Esther Castro were present. As to Arraignment, the Court finds defendant competent at this time. Defendant waived the reading of the Indictment. Plea of Not Guilty is entered. Defense is granted seven (7) days to obtain discovery and fourteen (14) days thereafter to file all motions. The case is referred to the Judge for trial setting thereafter. As to Detention, the Government moved for detention due to risk of flight. Defense counsel had no evidence to rebut the presumption, but reserved the right to reopen the matter of bail if additional information was to arise. Reservation was noted by the Court. The Court ordered defendant detained without bail pending trial. (Court Reporter FTR/bg.) Hearing set for 04:00. Hearing held at 04:57. Hearing ended at 05:00. Interpreter Sonia Crescioni.
